results.title: The Stepford wives (1975) [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Palomar Pictures International, Fadsin Cinema Associates, Edgar J. Scherick and Bryan Forbes
results.brief_description: Based on the novel by Ira Levin, the chilling and controversial story of “The Stepford wives” has become a cult classic with its cutting social commentary and chauvinistic/mysognystic themes. It is a tale of perfection, where perfect housewives dutifully serve their husbands and family in domestic bliss in their perfect homes in the sanitised but perfect suburb of Stepford. But something is horribly wrong. Why do all the Stepford men belong to the mysterious Stepford Men’s Club and why do all the women appear to look and behave in the same manner - vacant and robotic? Is there a strange conspiracy going on in the village of Stepford? This very 70s film features Katharine Ross, Paula Prentiss, Peter Masterson, Nanette Newman and Patick O’Neal with screenplay by William Goldman.

results.title: The Stepfather
results.creator_credit: ITC Productions, Jay Benson and Joseph Ruben
results.brief_description: Terry O’Quinn is “the Stepfather”, the man with the generic name because he has been a stepfather many times. He also has a gruesome way of ending relationships and severing the family ties; he kills them when they fail to meet his perfect standards and moves on to the next family. Shelley Hack and Jill Schoelen are cast as his latest victims.

results.title: The Steam-driven adventures of Riverboat Bill (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Based on the Riverboat Bill books by Cliff Green. Riverboat Bill and young Dave Freshwater restore an old paddle-steamer, and, along with a fire breathing Bunyip and Black Ben the Pirate, have many adventures sailing the Murray River.

Riverboat Bill and young Dave Freshwater restore an old paddle-steamer, and, along with a fire breathing Bunyip and Black Ben the Pirate, have many adventures sailing the Murray River. results.title: The Staunch tin soldier
results.brief_description: A puppet film for children based on the fairy tale by Hans Christian Anderson. Tin soldiers are cast and appear among the other toys on the birthday table. At night the toys come to life and the staunch tin soldier who has only one leg, falls in love with the little dancer.

results.title: The Star maker = L'Uomo Delle Stelle
results.creator_credit: Checci Gori Group, Summit Entertainment, Vittorio Cecchi Gori and Giuseppe Tornatore
results.brief_description: From Guiseppe Tornatore, director of “Cinema Paradiso”, this is a story drenched in the filmmaker’s love for cinema. Set in Sicily in the early 1950s, it is the story of Joe Morelli (Sergio Castellitto), a con man who travels by truck from village to village posing as a film company representative. For a fee, he offers his victims screen tests, using passages from a script of “0

results.title: The Star child
results.creator_credit: Billy Budd Films, Sal Campo, Tony Chaskelson and Ted Berenson
results.brief_description: Two woodcutters, Gustave and Sven, witness a shooting star one cold evening and go searching for the gold they believe is at the end of it. Instead, the delivery is a little baby whom they take home, call Pero (love), and are convinced will grow up to be a great leader. On maturation he grows into a bully of a child who is unconvinced that the beggar woman who turns up in the village can be the mother of such a beautiful child as him. Thus begins a journey for the source of true beauty and a task that will test his level of compassion. Adapted from a short story by Oscar Wilde and animated by Lindsay Van Blerk, Min Che Lin, Brett Schuman and Ted Berenson. Voices: Keith Grenville, Joe Wishnia, Liz Williams, Linda Delport.

results.title: The Stamp Collector
results.brief_description: This compilation program includes two films on stamps in the Australian and Pacific regions. “Pictures that Post” looks at the objects and artworks which have made their way onto our postage stamps. “A Fragile Piece of History” documents the final re-enactment of the tin can mail delivery in the Tongan islands.

results.title: The Stable door
results.creator_credit: Ronald H Riley and Associates, Ronald H. Riley and Pat Jackson
results.brief_description: While a gang plan to rob a warehouse, an insurance company tries to persuade the owners of the warehouse to improve their security arrangements. The result proves the value of precautions, which apply equally in the home, office or factory.
